mapper.select: select group_name, group_img, opendate from group_info
select * from group_info left join area on group_info.area_code = area.area_code where area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{category},'%') and group_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') and enabled = 1
mapper.insert: insert into group_schedule(group_no, subject, location, content, type, startdate, enddate, xcoord, ycoord) values (#{group_no}, #{subject}, #{location} ,#{content}, #{type}, #{startdate}, #{startdate}, #{xcoord}, #{ycoord})
mapper.select: select schedule_no, type as title, startdate as start from group_schedule where group_no = #{group_no}
select * from group_schedule where group_no = #{group_no} and schedule_no = #{schedule_no}
delete from group_schedule where group_no = #{group_no} and schedule_no = #{schedule_no}
